name: Mint cat
description:
An exciting and simple puzzle game with cats.

Install this brand new game for free, and you will have the opportunity to combine exciting gameplay with the ability to train concentration of attention and flexibility of thinking.

How to play.

At the same time, the contours of different cats and other figures are drawn on the screen so that their faces intersect forming many small figures.

You need for the allotted time to find all cats on the screen, highlighting them in parts, thereby to paint over the entire contour of the desired cat.

In the game you will find:

- many original levels;

- Many different cats.
